summary: My second follower to date play ready with Non Vanilla clothing and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]Here is Alexius my second follower to date. She is equipped with non vanilla armor and weapons and can be found in Dragonbridge at the Four Shields Tavern. 
Non Essential
Nord Race
Combat Skills: Melee, Ranged and Magic
Health, Magicka and Stamina 500
Firebolt, Frostbite and Healing
Pink Princess Outfit
(2) XIV Daggers
ElvenHawkBow
Required:
XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended
HDT Physics Extensions (For breast, butt, outfit and vag animations).
Installation: Use NMM or manual

*Tattoo and Non Tattoo versions

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniac- High Quality Glossy Female Body Texture 8K 4K 2K by Regenbot03[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows by Hello Santa[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77618/?]UNPB Pink Princess Outfit by gutris1[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13317/?]Better Bows by Howiego08[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4683/?]DaggerCraftPackage by faxivcm[/url]

Tattoo by me

Nifscope
Photoshop
Gimp
Creation Kit
Skyrim
